ygData.subject: Re: Runed Bone Fork......
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve always thought of it as more of a smirk.  As in, I wonder if he realizes just how dumb a bard looks carrying around a skull on a stick. Probably not.
ygData.messageBody:
I've always thought of it as more of a smirk. As in, "I wonder if he
realizes just how dumb a bard looks carrying around a skull on a stick.
Probably not."

-Gaelaian Galaenor, perpetual 22nd level bard who will always refuse to
carry an ugly stick because it's.. well.. ugly.

----- Original Message -----
From: "John Tatsukawa" <jht@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: January 7, 2000 18:32
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork......


> Gak! I was just copying what was from the previous email. Just too busy to
> keep up on the list and "proofread" previously written email. Oh well. Now
I
> have to go and apologize to my own Staff of Writhing for the blunder. I
> wonder if he'll still smile at me like he always does. :-)
>
> ---Windleaf
